review: Easy to install. Chromecast device and Chrome browser are very nicely integrated. I discovered that I can only cast Web site videos, not dedicated video viewer applications.
author: Doyle R Painter Jr

review: Works as advertised, arrived quickly and package good.  The only issue is that it only works with specific applications and not on Chrome on Android for example.
author: Ihab Riad

review: Although installation wsa a bit of a challange, when done it worked as promised. No problemo! This dongle interfacing with my cell phone for a wireless remote for netflix. Get rid of your cable bills.
author: michael Frank

review: Great item.  And easy to use.The best of the best.I recomended it because it worms perfectly.Thanks Google
author: Manuel Castillo

review: best thing you could buy as a gift for someone honestly since its cheap and provides a lot of power to any hdmi capable tv
author: josean

review: Easy to use to watch our favorite shows on a bigger screen.  Great price and value. Synced it with the on-line version to go cordless too.
author: Rita DeVore

review: Love how easy it was to set up and how small it is.  We can easily pack this and bring with us on our travels. I only wish it did amazon prime. Hopefully it will in the future
author: T. Smith "BZMAMA"

review: It is amazing and I can watch TV shows on the TV that I couldn't before and I love it!!!!
author: Sunil tikyani

review: This is a fabulous item!  LOVE being able to send stuff from my iphone right to the tv!  It sends a lot more things than just netflix, hulu and YouTube.  You can send all your PC screens!  The only reason I don't give it 5 stars is that you are at least weekly resetting it all up as it looses it's connection.  :(
author: William Ryalls

review: Product was very easy to follow directions and set up and understand the installation! I would definitely recommend this product.
author: AMJ
